mainEntityOfPage.name: Route4Trucks Commercial Route Planner App
mainEntityOfPage.keywords: trucker GPS, commercial vehicle navigation, truck routing app, multi-stop trucking, vehicle constraints, height restrictions, width restrictions, weight limits, hazmat routing, voice-guided navigation, commercial compliance, truck path planning
mainEntityOfPage.description: Route4Trucks is a commercial route planner app designed specifically for commercial vehicles, including all Class 1-8 trucks. The app allows drivers to easily plan multi-stop commercial routes that adapt to vehicle constraints such as height, width, weight, and hazmat restrictions, ensuring compliance with state and local regulations. With voice-guided GPS navigation, drivers can keep their eyes on the road while receiving accurate directions and ETAs. Unlike consumer GPS apps, Route4Trucks creates routes specifically for commercial vehicles, helping drivers avoid low-clearance accidents and unauthorized roads. Perfect for both local deliveries and long trips spanning multiple states, it works for LTL, FTL drivers, and even RV enthusiasts.

offers.description: Try Route4Trucks with a 7-day free trial, then $9.99/month for continued access to commercial truck routing and GPS navigation.

aggregateRating.description: The weighted aggregate rating was calculated using ratings from multiple platforms (weighted by review count and platform credibility): Google Play (4.3, 14544 reviews, weight 0.7), Apple App Store (4.6, 10700 reviews, weight 1.5), Capterra (4.4, 390 reviews, weight 4.0) and G2 (4.6, 102 reviews, weight 5.0). Google Play and Apple App Store contribute the largest volumes but are user-driven, with Google Play subject to strong influence from competitive manipulation and Apple App Store benefiting from a more curated environment. Capterra provides professional, business-oriented reviews and G2's highly trusted platform ensures its smaller volume has significant influence. This weighting balances volume, trust and relevance.
